Package com.safenetinc.luna.provider.signature

Contains classes that provide message signing and verification using keys on the Luna HSM.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
LunaSignature A base class for all Luna provider signature engine classes.
LunaSignatureDSA DSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureECDSA ECDSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureECDSAWithDigest A base class for all ECDSA signature engine classes
LunaSignatureMD2withRSA MD5withRSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureRSA RSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureRSAWithDigest A base class for all Signature engine classes
LunaSignatureRSAX9_31 RSAX9_31 signature engine class
LunaSignatureRSAX9_31NonFips RSAX9_31NonFips signature engine class
LunaSignatureRSAX9_31WithDigest A base class for all RSA X9.31 with Digest Signature engine classes
LunaSignatureSHA1withDSA SHA1withDSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA1withECDSA SHA1withECDSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA1withRSA SHA1withRSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA1withRSAandPSS SHA1withRSAandMGF1 signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA1withRSAX9_31 SHA1withRSAX9_31 signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA1withRSAX9_31NonFips SHA1withRSAX9_31NonFips signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA224withECDSA SHA224withECDSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA224withRSA SHA224withRSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA224withRSAandPSS SHA224withRSAandPSS signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA224withRSAX9_31 SHA224withRSAX9_31 signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA224withRSAX9_31NonFips SHA224withRSAX9_31NonFips signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA256withECDSA SHA256withECDSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA256withECDSAGBCS SHA256withECDSAGBCS signature engine class Required for GBCS (LHSM-13774)
LunaSignatureSHA256withRSA SHA256withRSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA256withRSAandPSS SHA256withRSAandPSS signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA256withRSAX9_31 SHA256withRSAX9_31 signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA256withRSAX9_31NonFips SHA256withRSAX9_31NonFips signature engine class

LunaSignatureSHA384withRSA SHA384withRSA signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA384withRSAandPSS SHA384withRSAandPSS signature engine class
LunaSignatureSHA384withRSAX9_31 SHA384withRSAX9_31 signature engine class

Package com.safenetinc.luna.provider.signature Description

Contains classes that provide message signing and verification using keys on the Luna HSM.
